pageProps.title: Should a non-programmer start with the Unity or Unreal engines?
pageProps.metaDesc: As a non-programmer, you might be interested in exploring game development as a hobby or career path. However, with so many game engines available, it can be daunting to decide which one to start with. Two of the most popular engines are Unity and Unreal. In this article, we will explore the pros and cons of each engine to help you make an informed decision on which one to start with.
